rows.label: qst710205_msg0002
rows.name:
Ah, what a sight... A typical Iiran
scene if ever there was one.

rows.label: qst710205_msg0003
rows.name:
It seems that there are some things
that Metsu cannot destroy.

rows.label: qst710205_msg0004
rows.name:
That's the lesson we must take from
this.

rows.label: qst710205_msg0005
rows.name:
That's right. We can't allow these small
pleasures to be taken from us again.

rows.label: qst710205_msg0006
rows.name:
Seeing all the fish swimming happily
really brings the area back to life.

rows.label: qst710205_msg0007
rows.name: No, that's not true at all...

rows.label: qst710205_msg0008
rows.name:
The only way we're bringing this
place back to life is by pulling together
and looking to the future.

rows.label: qst710205_msg0009
rows.name:
Still, I couldn't have got this far
without your help.

rows.label: qst710205_msg0010
rows.name:
I'll take care of these little fellows,
you have my word on that! And once
again...thank you.
